page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The option of jobs in Silver End is John Carrs,joinery,Heron printers,Cego and Crittalls double glazing.At John Carrs,the average number employed is 85,25% are women.There are 8 office workers and 3 management staff,carpen- ters, machine & assembly workers each make up approx.one third of the work force. 4 apprentices a year receive college training.Cego employ 220 men; 80 women work full time on the assem- bly line of these 70 are office staff. Each year 5 apprentices are taken on and have college training.No Youth Opportunity schemes are in operation, at Herons there is union opposition. Considerable overtime is common except at Herons.Herons employ 116 factory workers 12% women who work mainly in the bindery,23 office staff, 1 director-split between the Silver End and Witham plants.
